name: Erik Schierboom
bio: I am a developer with a passion for learning new languages. C# is a well-designed and expressive language that I love programming in.

name: Edward Rustin
bio: I'm a Consultant and a Tech Lead who runs teams of developers, mostly working in C#. I've been writting C# for over a decade, building anything from trading platforms to search engines to smaller webAPIs for my own projects.
